title: Brick Lane - Chanu assumes that the conductor

content.prompt: During the exchange between Chanu and the conductor in “Where’ve you...thirty years”, Chanu most likely assumes that the conductor

choices.label: has previously seen him traveling on this bus route
incorrectly assumes he is a visiting tourist
thinks the answers to his questions are obvious
shrewdly assesses the dynamic of his family

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
